I've also developed a bit of a chameleon-like ability to blend in, to become whoever I need to be in order to get the story. Of course, there's always a risk of being discovered, of having my cover blown. But even with all these precautions in place, there's still an element of risk involved. That's why I've developed a bit of a sixth sense, a radar that alerts me when someone's getting too close to the truth. When that happens, I know it's time to pull back, to regroup and reassess my strategy.
